channel.title: Agility problem, need help
channel.description:
Ok so ive a problem, everytime i try to walk across the log it wont do it i gain the xp but he still says on the same spot then he climbs up through rope and i get as far as the rope and he will give me the xp i would get for the rope but i stay there and cant proceed further so i guess you see the problem, i was wondering can anyone take a look and tell me whats wrong, and how to fix it, here is my agility.java - http://pastebin.com/WpPZBCyH actionhandler.java - http://pastebin.com/wK2UheiL
If needed anything else comment..
